entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
